name: Black Diary
notes: iOS version from https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1043410140 run using the Ren'Py SDK.

files.file1: N/A:Please select the iOS app file

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the iOS app file
game:
  args: blackdiary
  exe: renpy.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/blackdiary/game
    src: $CACHE/Payload/BlackDiaryCase4and5.app/base/game
requires: renpy
